original_text: (The Lord God of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and bless you, as he hath promised you!)
korean_text: 너희 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 너희를 현재보다 천 배나 많게 하시며 너희에게 허락하신 것과 같이 너희에게 복 주시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God of your fathers
make you a thousand times so many more as ye are
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 천 배 더 많게 하시고
